backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing user messages in a Map with submit, list, and count operations.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report describing implemented features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like text listing concise summaries of many frontend files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_FAILURE_REPORT.md: Template for documenting deployment failures and related diagnostic details.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_OUTPUT.md: Template describing latest deployment status, timestamp, and commands executed.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md: Runbook explaining how to retry deployment without making code changes.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color palette, typography, and layout utilities.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document including SEO meta tags, icons, and root mount point for the app.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all crawlers and referencing sitemap.
frontend/public/site.webmanifest: Web app manifest defining icons, colors, and PWA display settings.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap XML listing the main site URL and metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composition with sections, SEO, preloader, and error boundary wrapped in a QueryClientProvider.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that shows a fallback UI and logs caught errors.
frontend/src/components/BrandAssetPreloa: Component that preloads brand logo assets and logs load success or failure.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, mutation-based submission, and success/error UI states.
frontend/src/components/MobileNav.tsx: Renders a mobile navigation menu that highlights the active section and triggers smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/SectionHeader.ts: Displays a section header with optional subtitle and configurable alignment.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Builds the About section with text content, imagery, core values, and leadership profiles.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Provides the Contact section with contact details, supporting imagery, and the contact form.
frontend/src/components/sections/HomeSec: Hero section with background video/image, motion preference handling, and CTA buttons scrolling to other sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/Project: Renders a projects grid with icons, descriptions, and impact details using siteContent data.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Displays service cards with mapped icons, titles, and descriptions sourced from siteContent.
frontend/src/components/sections/Testimo: Shows testimonial cards with quotes, names, and roles pulled from siteContent.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Presents a grid of reasons to choose the company, each with an icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/SeoStructuredDat: Injects organization schema data into the page for SEO in JSON-LD format.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Provides footer layout with company info, quick links, contact details, and logo download support.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Creates a sticky site header with desktop and mobile navigation and smooth scrolling to sections.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Centralized content configuration object containing text and structure for all site sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActiveSection.ts: Tracks and returns the currently visible page section using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on authentication state, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects user reducedâ€‘motion preference via media query and updates on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation hook for submitting messages through the backend actor and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useRuntimeSeo.ts: React hook that updates canonical and social meta tags to match the current site origin at runtime.
frontend/src/index.css: Imports the root CSS file for the frontend bundle.
frontend/src/lib/brandAssets.ts: Exports constants defining paths to all logo and brand asset images.
frontend/src/lib/isValidEmail.ts: Provides a simple email validation function using a basic regex.
frontend/src/lib/siteOrigin.ts: Utilities to get the current site origin and build full URLs from paths.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme settings, plugins, and design tokens.
project_state.json: Describes project state, logo redesign requirements, and related frontend update tasks.
